full_text: Hawa Abdi guided the growth of her village from a one-room rural maternity clinic, into a 400-bed hospital with three operating theatres, a school for 850 children and seven feeding centres. Our obituary from last year #IWD2021 https://t.co/qdD2EcIzFN

localize.full_text: Hawa Abdi指导她的村庄从一个只有一间房的农村妇产科诊所发展成为拥有400张床位、3个手术室、850名儿童的学校和7个供餐中心的医院。我们去年的讣告#IWD2021 https://t.co/qdD2EcIzFN
Hawa Abdi指導她的村莊從一個只有一間房的農村婦產科診所發展成爲擁有400張牀位、3個手術室、850名兒童的學校和7個供餐中心的醫院。我們去年的訃告#IWD2021 https://t.co/qdD2EcIzFN
